lead_paragraph: The account in THE TIMES of the situation in Japan and China and the plight of our people still held captive there merely re-emphasizes the urgent necessity of our rendering greater aid to China in her fight against Japanese aggression. While our habits of life are very little changed, and we enjoy most of our usual comforts, our friends, the Chinese, the British, the Dutch and the Russians, are suffering the extremities of hardship.
abstract: Lr urging US aid to China
